<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create an immediate collection"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/collection"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




Use this endpoint to Create a collection

Rules based on the type of collection: 

|Collection|Property|Rule|
|----------|:-------------|------|
|CHANGE|'withdrawal'|this object cannot be inserted.|
|WITHDRAWAL|'change'|this object cannot be inserted.|
|CHANGE|'vlcpAmount'|This property must be the same of 'amount.original' property.|

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
